scenes.background: In the meeting, Monica taps her pen on the table, looking uneasy.
scenes.description: Monica says, 'I think we're getting sidetracked with all this back and forth.'

options.text: Let's focus on our main objectives and avoid unnecessary discussions.
options.analysis: You aim to bring the discussion back on track, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I agree, but hearing everyone's input is crucial to avoid future conflicts.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the importance of everyone's input, showing high empathy and willingness to prevent future issues.

options.text: Maybe we can set a time limit for discussions to keep things moving.
options.analysis: You propose a practical solution to manage time effectively, displaying good social skills and motivation.
